item.title: Initial Commit
item.description:
devashish.me https://devashish.me/posts/initial_commit/ -

For the V4 version of this blog, I’ve decided to remove all the old entries and start from scratch. With one significant change though: posting tech content only.

Over time I’ve lost interest in writing travel blogs and inflicting my unfiltered thoughts on public forums. At the same time, I’d started documenting my experiences and learnings at work, conversations with other people in industry and takeaways from reading up on the topics that excite me.

I (re)started this blog with a few objectives

  • Document my journey in building tech solutions
  • Keep notes about interesting concepts, their implementations and other aspects
  • Have discussion(s) about the “right” way to solve problems

To new beginnings!

item.title: About
item.description:
devashish.me https://devashish.me/about/ -

I have 10+ years of experience working for 4 early stage startups (two exits), building enterprise and consumer products from ground up. During this time, I’ve led distributed teams to deliver secure, scalable and high growth products.

My primary focus has been to design iterable application architecture to deliver maximum value. I’ve built products that help organizations and teams deploy their code faster, flowing through a series of complex DevOps transitions and gateways.

Using the automation-first approach, I believe in creating processes to optmize developer productivity, democratize team learning and maximize cross team collaboration.

When not working, I like to cook, hike, play tennis, ride my motorcycle or think of ways to automate some part of my life.
